argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | grpsubid.b | |- B = ( Base ` G ) |
| 2 |  | grpsubid.o | |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) |
| 3 |  | grpsubid.m | |- .- = ( -g ` G ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( +g ` G ) = ( +g ` G ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( invg ` G ) = ( invg ` G ) |
| 6 | 1, 4, 5, 3 | #P_grpsubval | |- ( ( X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> ( X .- Y ) = ( X ( +g ` G ) ( ( invg ` G ) ` Y ) ) ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_3adant1 | |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> ( X .- Y ) = ( X ( +g ` G ) ( ( invg ` G ) ` Y ) ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_eqeq1d | |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> ( ( X .- Y ) = .0. <-> ( X ( +g ` G ) ( ( invg ` G ) ` Y ) ) = .0. ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_simp1 | |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> G e. Grp ) |
| 10 | 1, 5 | #P_grpinvcl | |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ Y e. B ) -> ( ( invg ` G ) ` Y ) e. B ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_3adant2 | |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> ( ( invg ` G ) ` Y ) e. B ) |
| 12 |  | #P_simp2 | |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> X e. B ) |
| 13 | 1, 4, 2, 5 | #P_grpinvid2 | |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ ( ( invg ` G ) ` Y ) e. B /\ X e. B ) -> ( ( ( invg ` G ) ` ( ( invg ` G ) ` Y ) ) = X <-> ( X ( +g ` G ) ( ( invg ` G ) ` Y ) ) = .0. ) ) |
| 14 | 9, 11, 12, 13 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> ( ( ( invg ` G ) ` ( ( invg ` G ) ` Y ) ) = X <-> ( X ( +g ` G ) ( ( invg ` G ) ` Y ) ) = .0. ) ) |
| 15 | 1, 5 | #P_grpinvinv | |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ Y e. B ) -> ( ( invg ` G ) ` ( ( invg ` G ) ` Y ) ) = Y ) |
| 16 | 15 | #P_3adant2 | |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> ( ( invg ` G ) ` ( ( invg ` G ) ` Y ) ) = Y ) |
| 17 | 16 | #P_eqeq1d | |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> ( ( ( invg ` G ) ` ( ( invg ` G ) ` Y ) ) = X <-> Y = X ) ) |
| 18 |  | #P_eqcom | |- ( Y = X <-> X = Y ) |
| 19 | 17, 18 | #P_syl6bb | |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> ( ( ( invg ` G ) ` ( ( invg ` G ) ` Y ) ) = X <-> X = Y ) ) |
| 20 | 8, 14, 19 | #P_3bitr2d | |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> ( ( X .- Y ) = .0. <-> X = Y ) ) |
